name: command-center-of-denver-eth-2022-hack
description: set of commands to run connectors and etc
author: DeepSkills Hack Team <denys.p@affinidi.com>

scripts.fullInstall: cd ./connectors/sourcecred/instance && yarn install && cd ../../coordinApe && npm install && cd ../github && npm install && cd ../sourcecred/server && npm install
scripts.startSystem: pm2 start processes.yaml && npm run sourceCredLoad && npm run sourceCredStart
scripts.test: cd ./connectors/sourcecred/server && npm run test && cd ../../coordinApe && npm run test && cd ../github && npm run test && cd ../../issuer && npm run test
